experience: Kyle can introduce you to 15 people at Google
Senior Manager, Pharmacy Growth (Business Partnerships and Emerging Growth Opportunities)

Responsible for the definition, development, and deployment of strategic growth initiatives for CVS Health's retail pharmacy businessIncluding:- Pharmacy network configuration and planning- Medicare Part D- Growth with Seniors- Synergies related to CVS Health's ~$12.7B 2015 acquisition of Omnicare, a pharmacy services provider in the senior living and long-term (health) care market- Support for and implementation of CVS Pharmacy's B2B (Business to Business) ventures with health plans, payors, and health systemsAt #7 on the Fortune 500, CVS Health is one of the largest healthcare companies in the world. The company operates across four major lines of business:• Retail Pharmacy (CVS Pharmacy, Longs, Navarro, and Drogaria Onofre)• Pharmacy Benefits Management (Caremark - prescription benefits for health insurance plans)• Clinical Services  (Minute Clinic - a walk-in medical clinic) (Omnicare - pharmacy services for LTC and senior living settings) (Coram - an infusion provider)• Specialty Pharmacy (CVS Specialty - support for patients with rare & complex conditions)
MBA Intern (Pricing, Contracting, and Distribution Strategy)

Led a cross-functional assessment to review the strategic and operational implications of innovative  contracting (value-based contracting) efforts to align drug prices with value across the pharmaceutical/biotechnology manufacturer’s product portfolioConsidered the founder of the biotechnology industry, Genentech discovers, develops, manufactures and commercializes medicines to treat patients with serious or life-threatening medical conditions. It has long been a leader in understanding and advancing the fields of cancer biology, cancer immunology and oncology drug discovery. The company's therapeutic focus areas now include Oncology, Immunology, Neuroscience, Metabolism, and Infectious Disease.

Responsible for the research, definition, and implementation of patient-oriented healthcare services and initiatives targeted for 7,500+ CVS stores. Managed and supported projects from ideation to execution including market research/sizing, business case development, operational design, and product testing for CVS' Retail Strategic Product Development department.• Owned decisions for new initiatives throughout the product development cycle (market research, business case development, product/process design, testing)• Selected to lead a high profile confidential strategic analysis and support the (DCF) valuation of a ~$200MM+ growth company in the pharmaceutical inventory management space

Conducted analysis and developed strategic recommendations for clients as a Strategy & Operations consultant. Deloitte is the world's largest management consulting firm.Functional Experience:• Corporate growth strategy• Regulatory strategy• Organizational planning and restructuring• Process improvement and cost reductionIndustry Experience:• Healthcare / Life sciences (pharmaceuticals, medical devices, health insurers)• Consumer products• Financial servicesTechnical Experience:• Legislation (Health Reform [Affordable Care Act] and The HITECH Act)• Regulation (FDA Medical Device 510(k) Approval, Drug Risk Evaluation & Mitigation Strategies)• Pharmaceutical comparative effectiveness• Pharmaceutical safety surveillance• Health Information Technology (HIT)

Had the pleasure of working with Kyle on a project critical to the CEO of our client (a Fortune 100 company).  Kyle was professional, reliable, and very capable-- as well as good at coming up with creative solutions to issues.  Without Kyle we would not have been able to impress the CEO and the (formerly skeptical) Director.
